text: @DineshDSouza Some Doctors now think some patients that died earlier of respiratory diseases may have died of coronavirus. Hard to confirm without adequate testing. About the flu Dinesh, people die because they’re too stubborn to go get a flu shot. There’s no vaccine for #coronavirus.
